setting.gridBottom: The distance from the bottom of the grid
setting.gridLeft: The distance from the left of the grid
setting.gridRight: The distance from the right of the grid
setting.gridTop: The distance from the top of the grid
setting.isSelectedMode: Whether series can be toggled displaying
setting.itemGap: The distance between title and subtitle
setting.legendLeft: The distance from the left of the legend
setting.legendTop: The distance from the top of the legend
setting.subtitle: Subtitle
setting.title: Title
setting.titleLeft: The distance from the left of the title
setting.titleTop: The distance from the top of the title

table.title: Data Name
table.xData: X-axis Data(Data should be separated by spaces or commas)
table.yData: Y-axis Data(Data should be separated by spaces or commas)
